body:
Comment 1: 
I'm afraid this isn't possible to do without possibly blowing up at run time.

In your example
  a, b, c := strings.Split("a,b,c", ",")...
You have a specific number of variables on the LHS but an unknown number of values on
the RHS. What happens if you write
  a, b, c := strings.Split("nope", "hello!")
??
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
